author: {'steamid': '76561198064033287', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 57, 'playtime_forever': 497, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 497, 'last_played': 1559425351}
review:
последняя действительно годная нептуния.. через 2 года серия сдохла окончательно. небольшая сводка
- re 1 - ахуенная
- re 2 - ахуенная
- re 3 - почти этанол jrpg
- ответвленния типа U и про Нуар - серия еще не сдохла но можно было эти игры не выпускать они нахуй не нужны
Viii - мыло в глаза попадает но все сглаживается ахуенным всем остальным
Ну а дальше начало пиздеца
- viir - тут уже становится ясно что серия подыхает.. не нужная игра которая ЕЩЕ ХУЖЕ оригинала.. нет длс персов.. пиздец просто 3/10
4 богини онлайн - игра тупо 10/10 и это лучшая нептуния но разрабы не угадали в итоге why.. им показалось что статичные персонажи, дохуя гринда и непошаговый геймплей зарешали ан нет зарешал кооп но разрабы недогадались ну тупыыые
супер нептуния рпг - все смэрть серия сдохла без шансов на оживление это самая всратая игра 2к19 года
нептуния виртуал старс - АХАХАХАХАХА

author: {'steamid': '76561198328930242', 'num_games_owned': 124, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 1506, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1503, 'last_played': 1637845119}

author: {'steamid': '76561198055181574', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 212, 'playtime_forever': 2602, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2602, 'last_played': 1489885285}
review:
Oh man Megadimension Neptunia VII where do I even start. Its fantastic, just straight up fantastic. Usually in the Neptunia series you always have to say something bad about the game or tell people that its more niche then anything. But this is the first time id recommend a game in the series to anyone and tell them there are barely any bad points. Its just a high quality RPG that is fun and has a lot going for it.

The game doesn't feel nearly as grindy as anything before. The story for once actually manages to strike a good balance between jokes and serious things happening. The big changes in overall combat and over world gameplay styles keep the gameplay fresh and keep the flashy nature of the Neptunia series. The new characters are fun and unique. And the way the game is shaped it almost never feels like you are staying in the same spot for too long, it refuses to stick with the same and keeps pushing for new and fun things to do constantly.

If there is anything bad I have to say about this game its that to enjoy it the most you have to go through the slog that is some of the earlier Rebirth games. Its fine to play stand alone but I highly recommend playing the earlier entries just to see how much this series evolved and just to get the inside jokes and the overall nature of the game better.

Its peak Neptunia and a great rpg as well. With its price nowadays its an easy recommend to anyone. Its a game that keeps the soul of Neptunia with all its quirkiness, charm and fun and truly pushes it to new levels.

author: {'steamid': '76561198152669078', 'num_games_owned': 142, 'num_reviews': 52, 'playtime_forever': 4427, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 175, 'last_played': 1653273087}
review:
The best fan-service JRPG and video game franchise is the Gamindustri franchise. Neptune is still the best waifu ever and i never changed my opinion since i saw the anime in 2017. Megadimension VII is probably the best title in the series so far, the story is interesting, brilliant and funny and the fighting system not really changed that much but still feels more polished, and you get a masterpiece like this for only 16.80? Definetely worth it. The fourth wall breaking jokes are amazing and i really hope that everyone try out this franchise atleast once in their life, especially this episode. 

Megadimension Neptunia is not just funny but also a great action-JRPG with thousands of 4th wall breaks and waifu material girls. If you are a weeb this is a must-buy if you are not then this game will be the reason you become one. 

Nep out of 10

author: {'steamid': '76561198083488873', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 199, 'playtime_forever': 5584, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5584, 'last_played': 1613227777}
review:
Le dimensioni di Gamindustri sono nuovamente sotto assedio da parte di nuove, oscure minacce…

La nostra storia continua nel remoto regno di Gamindustri, un mondo che coesiste con molteplici dimensioni, in cui le CPU, potenti entità guardiane, contrastano le varie minacce che di volta in volta si presentano per portare caos e distruzione nei vari mondi dimensionali, trionfando grazie alle loro abilità uniche. La Dimensione Zero, una di queste realtà, sta per andare incontro alla sua fine per mano di alcune malvagie entità che stanno distruggendo ogni cosa. La guardiana CPU di quel mondo non ha più la potenza necessaria per affrontare da sola la situazione e grida disperatamente aiuto a chiunque possa essere in ascolto in quei momenti drammatici. Nello stesso momento, nel mondo di Planeptune, la frizzante CPU guardiana Neptune trova un vecchio gioco da console con uno strano simbolo. Pensando di aver trovato un leggendario articolo vintage, decide di portarlo alla sua sorella Nepgear, nella speranza di farlo funzionare di nuovo, scatenando un vortice di energia che le risucchia in una dimensione sconosciuta.

Prepariamoci a un nuovo, incredibile viaggio nelle dimensioni in compagnia di Neptune, Nepgear, Uzume e molte altre CPU che incontreremo nel corso della vicenda, esplorando ambienti ricchi di dettagli, massacrando nuove orde di nemici strani e brutali che cercheranno di fermarci in frenetici scontri 3D a turni, pianificando strategie e mosse, concatenando combo, attacchi di gruppo e tecniche speciali, scatenando nuove trasformazioni per trionfare contro i numerosi e astuti Boss, accumulando esperienza per potenziare le nostre CPU, comprando e vendendo oggetti, armi, accessori, risorse e vestiti per gestire al meglio le varie situazioni in cui verremo a trovarci, padroneggiando un nuovo arsenale di abilità, mosse e sistemi mentre ci perdiamo nelle varie vicende principali, accompagnate da un comparto audio spettacolare. Nel corso della nostra avventura, assisteremo allo svolgersi della storia attraverso splendidi filmati in stile visual novel, alternando momenti epici, situazioni tragiche e siparietti comici, girovagando nelle varie zone delle mappa di gioco a caccia di nemici, missioni e risorse utili per la nostra causa, accumulando punti per poter potenziare le caratteristiche di ogni CPU, con nuovi processori per sbloccare devastanti trasformazioni da usare per gestire gli svariati nemici che troveremo in ogni zona del gioco mentre assisteremo a tutti gli eventi di questo quarto capitolo della leggendaria saga delle incantevoli e potenti CPU che anche questa volta dovranno darsi da fare per salvare i mondi ancora una volta dalle tremende forze del male.

Voto Personale 88/100

review: The only decent mainline game in the series. Combat is still boring and visuals are still a mess, but at least the difficulty curve feels good for the first time and the plot is somewhat decent. It's all thrown out of the window by stupid requirements to reach the ending where the game doesn't just go "welp, you were expecting more but here it ends".

author: {'steamid': '76561197983133112', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 102, 'playtime_forever': 6249, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 757, 'last_played': 1666727031}
review: it is a good game but, very grindy. from the start you have to grind a lot and you have to keep grinding for days before you can even get anywhere. if you are ok with that, i recommend it. if not, i recommend megadimension neptunia viiR. it have the same story but, leveling is considerably more streamlined. this game however have costumes not available in the other version(i think). i just got to blank`s chapter and met enemies that was too powerful with way chance to grind.

review:
To be honest this is a good game and its my first time I playing Neptune Series.
All the characters are likeable.
I got good ending at first try, dunno if I should go with my second playthrough to get the true ending.
Then again in my opinion I recommend this game, if you have spare money you can spend into the DLCs.
If you want your game not so broken, you can spend into nightwear pack, swimsuit pack, and the most important is Umio party character is the must. He is the only male playable character.

author: {'steamid': '76561198172960541', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 2185, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 604, 'last_played': 1628333927}
review:
【2020/6/29】
啊啊啊啊~我从08年就一直喜欢涅普了((≧︶≦*)。
终于高考完有时间玩正传最后一部，战斗以及界面与前作比起来优化了不少，战斗也逐渐变得有挑战性起来( •̀ ω •́ )y 
然而呢！米娜桑！更为重要的当然是我们最最可爱的涅普子啦，而且在这一部中居然有两份！ヾ(≧▽≦*)o 
是两份可爱的涅普涅普呢~
虽然说这个游戏卡关要肝很累累~但是每次打赢都能看到涅普的笑容呢o((>ω< ))o 
所列跌！即便这是正传的最后一部，但是我们和涅普仍然还有机会见面诺~从此以后只要有涅普看我就出钱钱,也希望大家也能享受这个愉快的游汐葉界~！( •̀ ω •́ )✧

author: {'steamid': '76561198431058501', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 10333, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10324, 'last_played': 1640493844}
review:
With a story that has just the right mix of wacky Gaming Meta hijinx and darkly serious plot, the usual loveable cast and many excellent new cast members, & a refined version of the classic gameplay that rewards intelligent use and ordering of moves, this is the absolute pinnacle of Neptunia, and Magnus Opus of Idea Factory + Compile Hearts. If you intend to get into Neptunia, absolutely, ABSOLUTELY, make sure you play this masterpiece of an RPG. You will *not* regret it.
(...Oh, and be sure to also support the release on Switch, for those of you that have one. May cause more of the series to show up eventually. #Totallynotshilling, lol.)

author: {'steamid': '76561198313795787', 'num_games_owned': 324, 'num_reviews': 64, 'playtime_forever': 8663, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5442, 'last_played': 1642575101}
review:
[strike]可算全成就了（吐血）[/strike]
打折入的，感觉还是挺值的。
优点嘛，立绘声优和音乐都是上等的。这种回合制游戏一开始也是十分的上头。建模对比前作有很大提升。live 2D也更精致了，虽然我觉得前作表现力更生动了。剧情的流程体验也更合理了，没前作那么拖。[spoiler]可以跳过技能动画yyds。[/spoiler]
难度在没武器包的情况下前期是中等偏上的，一开始的巨大战不练级真的难打，中期黄金塔推荐30级，后期心次元章打4女神推荐40级。
缺点嘛，大地图想法挺好，就是体验有点拉胯。尤其是这黄金塔的图，整个地图就一个配色，而且有的居然还要跳才能过去[spoiler]没错，就是绿国[/spoiler]，整的人一直在迷路啊艹。[strike]还有这阴间的nep探险零[/strike]
另外这一周目的道路的随机遇敌（非酋每个点都是怪），老是跑来跑去还是有点恶心的。
各国的商业升级显得过于没用，还是那几套换色简易皮肤。
[spoiler]能量棒是升级见闻者的。[/spoiler]
总的来说，对只打二周目真结局的玩家，也就黄金塔费事点，打折入很香的，[spoiler]nep天下第一![/spoiler][strike]打白金可就太阴间了[/strike]

author: {'steamid': '76561198417327519', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 3954, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3954, 'last_played': 1620909931}

author: {'steamid': '76561198803509531', 'num_games_owned': 544, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 4511, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4511, 'last_played': 1620399530}
review:
做为正传的最后一部，其体验真的要超过前面的所有，如果你是因为没中文，那你可以去VIIR[spoiler] VII 重置版[/spoiler]，画面大幅度升级，支持VR[spoiler] 可以不用 [/spoiler]与独立VR剧情，但与前面的操作差很多，需要适应，而且VR容易卡，结局也只有一个，如果时间比较少的话可以去玩VIIR，这也证明地雷社对最后的正传足够上心了。

作为最后的正传，不像日本ACG业界一样，最后得让所有系列角色都出场[spoiler] 毕竟三代玩过了 [/spoiler]，四代只是简单的老角色加上新角色来讲述完最后一个故事。声优方面，速水奖，竹达彩奈，户松遥、日高里菜、内田真礼等一众参与，粉丝狂欢。

在战斗性上，终于做出来一点RPG的特色，角色站位，连接发动技能成为游戏重要打法，而且一周目变的硬核，逼着你开始练级买药，不能无脑脸滚键盘，[spoiler] 甚至你随时能被小怪群殴至死 [/spoiler] 游戏虽然玩着困难，但终于有点意思。

剧情上，四女神都有了独立的支线，算是满足了铁杆粉丝，四国女神之间角色之间互动性变的更强。

地图方面，终于不是简单的换图了，开始变的多样了一点点点，小怪也开始不局限于一个地方，[spoiler] 就趴在你家门口 [/spoiler]。而且不会出现数据爆炸的情况，没有一刀999，满级999，隐藏道具玩法更加创新[spoiler] 肝 [/spoiler]，总体上来说一周目玩的是难度，二周目给强力辅助道具之后，玩的是剧情，[spoiler] 一周目能打多快打多快，50级以上就行，别的别肝 [/spoiler]

加上这作塑造的三个次元，已经突破了三代的次元局限，三个次元对应三代单元，每单元都有独立的音乐与开始游戏场景，尤其是心次元的妄想bgm，直接让我喜欢上了 Uzume [spoiler] 本多真梨子 [/spoiler]。地雷社这作甚至已经有了和别的JRPG比较的水平了

作为结局来讲，不足的是没有一个完整的BE，NE的高度足够，TE的完整性足够，但BE没有二代的BE一半好，没铺垫没cg没成就，就是NE的一个分支，作为最后的BE，BE线如果不够凄惨，那作为一周目的硬核都变的令人耻笑了。

从整体上来讲，其吐槽的东西还是很多，但其玩法与改变也足够让粉丝惊喜了，[spoiler] 尤其是UNI粉 [/spoiler]，之后八成也没有正传了，而无论是玩法还是剧情，只要你不是全成就党，那VII终于完成了一个好的结尾

author: {'steamid': '76561198036032673', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 7862, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7832, 'last_played': 1620145541}
review:
So this series isn't particularly good to begin with, and I say that as a huge fan of these games. They're an aquired taste, to say the least - About the only games worth playing, in my opinion, are the most up to date versions of the original three Hyperdimension Neptunia games, Rebirth 1, Rebirth 2 and Rebirth 3 (and even then, they aren't that good.)

Oh, but then there's this game.

This game is GOOD.

It very much rises above the mediocre-to-pretty-good-to-suddenly-really-bad swamp that this franchise is seemingly eternally stuck in. If you play one Hyperdimension Neptunia game, make sure it's this one. Some quick positives that help it stand out from the rest:

- The battle system is actually good

- Adult Neptune, the waifu of all waifus is in it

- No stupid Plans system

- New game + is actually good

- There's a very real air of production quality that just isn't present in the original games. Even to this day, the UI, the graphics, the sound design...It's all really good.

- Adult Neptune is in this game. Oh my GOD. Thank you GOD for Adult Neptune.

I've heard the VIIR remake is kinda bad, so play this one.

author: {'steamid': '76561198411359934', 'num_games_owned': 167, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 4081, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2952, 'last_played': 1663941744}
review:
Золотая тройка такие:
Б-ша: Да я маленькая девочка с ракетомётом в кармане как ты узнал?

author: {'steamid': '76561198350131628', 'num_games_owned': 6304, 'num_reviews': 72, 'playtime_forever': 6439, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6439, 'last_played': 1597582013}
review:
让我把你Nep Nep掉（新次元海王星V2全成就纪念）
本次带来的也是我肝了过百小时的游戏——新次元海王星V2。之前还刚买了一个超次元海王星主题的鼠标垫，碰到个卖家刚好也是超次元海王星的粉丝，于是把他之前珍藏专门设计过的图来给我做鼠标垫了，感觉效果不错~

没想到最后还是那个抽卡的成就卡主我了，我果然是个非洲人，想要出SR真的是太难了。

下面是游戏背景简介部分：

新的挑战者正在控制游戏业界，涅普缇努却不见了踪影。现在她要帮助一个神秘的陌生人来对抗一个巨大的邪恶的敌人，夺回她的女神头衔，顺便找点时间做布丁！在这个JRPG中，将有巨大的战斗、多个世界和多个故事情节！

说到当初接触海王星系列的原因，仅仅是因为大学期间的课余时间，实在找不到好玩的游戏，想找点东西肝一肝，于是乎被室友推荐了海王星系列。似乎是这个想法被G胖听见了，然后HB站就开始卖海王星系列的慈善包，当时得知消息后想都没想就直接最高价位买了大部分海王星作品，想一次性尽可能的多买点。后来又是由于玩这类游戏需要一个手柄，刚想着去买一个手柄，然后就被告知在Sakura Game的三色绘恋抽奖中了一台PS4，然后附赠一个手柄，意外赶上需求（我觉得这一切的一切都已经被安排好了）。

首先来简单的介绍下，超次元海王星可以说是一个粉丝向的游戏了。海王星的主要故事线被设定在了一个被称为“超次元”的世界里面，而地雷社以现实生活中的电子游戏业界作为蓝本，将主机、游戏厂商等一系列设定拟人化地创造出了“游汐叶界”这个大体，之后所有游戏的剧情主要就发生于此。游汐叶界一共由四个国家组成：女神紫灵心（Purple Heart）守护的“紫耀之都（Planeptune）”；女神黑灵心（Black Heart）守护的“黑土边域（Lastation）”；女神白灵心（White Heart）守护的“白露之滨（Lowee）”；女神绿灵心（Green Heart）守护的“绿荫箱庭（Leanbox）”。

其中，紫灵心代表现实世界的世嘉流产的Sega Neptune计划；黑灵心代表索尼PlayStation 3；白灵心代表任天堂Wii；而绿灵心代表着微软XBOX 360。四位守护女神一起经历了从战争对立到成为伙伴的逐步改变。此外，除了绿荫箱庭外（心疼空巢老露，就是因为微软没有发行过掌机喽），每位女神各自都拥有一位或者两位妹妹，她们被称之为“女神候补生”，代表着现实生活中所属阵营的掌机：Game Gear、PSP、NDS。女神与候补生藉由人们的“信仰心”而诞生，并以信仰心形成的力量“Share Energy”作为自身力量来守护、领导国家及国民。

以上就是大概介绍了游戏的整个背景，如有错误还望指出。再来谈一点别的，不知道各位在没有接触过海王星作品之前，是如何知道它的呢？你也许曾经在网络上看到过魔性的“吃瓜表情包”；或者是在某手游的联动中见识过了其精美的立绘；又或者是在其他游戏的MOD（例如求生之路2）中领略过主角们的身姿。这些都有可能成为你了解到海王星的途径，所以虽说超次元海王星是一款粉丝向游戏，但是它在非粉丝的群体也有一定的名气。

其次海王星作为地雷社的看家作品，游戏正传以传统的回合制RPG为主；然后系列游戏以人设、声优演出、萌娘化、变身等要素作为其主要的卖点。游戏核心以现实中主机发展史为剧本，用轻松诙谐的方式NETA游戏业界各式各样的梗（这也是它吸引我的原因之一，看这些梗也是挺有意思的）；日式风格的立绘与3D建模，不少萌豚是其忠实的拥趸，却又不是单纯的萌豚游戏。全系列粉丝向严重，不对其感冒玩家慎入，但是慢慢深入你就会发现它也是制作不错的游戏。

再来针对本作简单谈一谈我的感受吧（以下可能涉及到轻微剧情，请酌情观看）。首先除去信仰吧，个人感觉这也是属于目前PC上能玩到海王星里比较好玩的一部。还是那个熟悉的味道，但相比之下剧情流程变得更长，战斗系统上比前面几作更加丰富，还增添了各种阵型技能。而且对于城市的设施系统也有增加，投资什么的也算是比较有新意的。除了例行的新角色的登场，欢乐的游玩过程，还有那个新增的涅普探险，这个一开始也是把我的心态打崩了，是真的难。但完成之后感觉难度还好，就是需要多背板。最后偶尔也会有擦边球的服务镜头（还有新登场的四位黄金女圣斗士就不一一介绍了，还有新的形态次时代，还是自己去游玩感受会比较好一点）。

海王星系列作的剧情一向不是重点，看女神们卖萌玩梗已经足够。所以剧情不好评价，只能说仁者见仁，智者见智吧。但对比前几作，这次的剧情可以说是锦上添花，若对比其他游戏可能略显俗套 。作为一款典型日式rpg，流程大概是剧情→进图刷刷刷→Boss→剧情的循环，这样虽然对玩家有一定的限制，但却有很强的代入感，玩家可以很快融入到故事里，游戏性提高了不少。

游戏新特色：

全新战斗机制！角色可以发动连携攻击，通过“部件击破”来降低属性和能力或禁止其使用某些技能。而在“巨人战”中玩家需要巧妙利用这种特性来战胜强大的敌人！

次世代模式！变身第二形态加入！玩家可以在次世代模式下用更强力的攻击打败敌人，CPU们将得到全新的特技和外观。

三个世界、三个故事、三个模式！新的CPU角色加入之后，玩家需要辗转三个次元来拯救游戏世界！

全新地下城迷你游戏！还记得经典游戏“地下探险”吗？当你在时间限制内通过游戏时可以获得特殊的奖励物品！

由于海王星的介绍篇幅实在是太多了，不能一一列举出来，我这也是写出了一些比较有特色的内容，也是想尽可能多的介绍一下这个游戏。

由于不能过多的ghs，上次我就因为发超次元海王星的CG进过一次小黑屋，看来尺度有点大，不能被接受，所以想看游戏CG也可以去社区，或者是我的截图展柜里进行观看，希望可以有更多的人了解到超次元海王星。哦？你说你已经是NepNep的忠实粉丝了？shut up and take my money！只要你出Nep我就给你钱~

review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198057944303', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 2883, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2883, 'last_played': 1591555773}
review:
If you're interested in the series I would recommend playing this one over the others. Plot didn't take itself too seriously, I enjoyed all of the characters and their personalities, and the voice acting is actually pretty good in my opinion. Obviously there's a lot of common anime tropes so if you just physically cringe seeing it on your screen don't get this game. 

The actual RPG part of the game wasn't very difficult but I did enjoy the creative 3D positioning and AoE on attacks. Dungeons are explorable in 3D and also platform-y. They weren't crazily well designed but I enjoyed going through them. The music actually bangs and the soundtrack has bangers in the dungeon themes and battle themes.

I recommend this game but I see it go on sale for 50% or more pretty often and I'd wait for a sale instead of picking it up at $20 since it felt kind of short to me for a JRPG.

author: {'steamid': '76561198014784364', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 2072, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2072, 'last_played': 1618147456}
review:
I tried to like the game. I really did. The grind lover in me kept going all the way to NG+ and hoping the game would get good. It never did. Maybe if the true ending wasn't so easily missable i would have continued playing because apparently the guild missions from rank A upwards (along with some other stuff) are locked behind that ending and i sure as hell am not going to complete the game a third time. What pisses me off is that i did exactly what the guide told me and still couldn't get the correct ending. 

Other bad things include:
- Bad voice actors and dialogue. Squealing, high pitched anime girls + cringy writing = Constant cutscene skipping.
- Performance issues. It looks like a PS3 game but runs like garbage. Sometimes there are even sound glitches. Good thing i never played with headphones on because that loud, sudden crack would have popped my eardrums.
- First chapter is a tutorial. After that you follow 4 different heroines. Too bad that chapter feels like a tutorial as well. When you finally manage to clear that out of the way, the game finally starts.
- Events that progress the story. Sometimes there are way too many separate conversations you have to go through before you're able to continue. And they can be the stupidest things as well. At some point in the second chapter i started skipping almost everything. I would slow down here and there to follow the story but would soon find out it's the same silly crap only teenagers can enjoy.

Then there's the okay things:
- Combat. Combo system is a nice idea but i feel like it wasn't executed well enough. Most of the time you're just spamming skills and recovering HP & SP somewhere in between. Then there's the different AOE's skills and weapons have. In a way the combat reminds me of Disgaea. Only in 3D environment. And that Disgaea is actually fun. Also Disgaea's special attacks are nice to look at. Most of VII's aren't. You just can't feel the impact they are supposed to give you.
- Soundtrack. Not good, not bad. It plays on the background and that's it.
- All the little things you can do. Investments, route building, scouts, development. Normally i'd love this kinda thing but here it's just bland. They are just there to play around with but nothing ever got me excited and nothing ever gave me rewards worthy of the time i put in.

The good:
- The "Skip" button. It skips and speeds up all the things you don't want to see. And there's a lot of those.

If this is the best Neptunia game out there, i don't want to know how bad the others are. Only buy this from the 7€ sale if you're a die hard JRPG and anime tiddie fan.

author: {'steamid': '76561198100730896', 'num_games_owned': 331, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 5165, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5165, 'last_played': 1615530424}
review:
本着尊敬游戏开发者的理念把游戏白金了，但是感觉自己像被强奸了一样，希望后来人有白金的念头之前可以先认真考虑下。

游戏时长约60-70小时，全剧情auto播放语音+双结局通关，但后面的全收集就算我开着修改器也花了20-30小时才完成，这还是有攻略辅助的情况，向攻略dalao致敬，没有剧情的多口相声我感觉游戏的乐趣少了70%，可能我喜欢海王星的点只是可爱的女孩子们和层出不穷的梗吧，游戏系统只是折磨玩家的工具罢了(

一些给白金向的建议：
1、建议在二周目进行收集，会给很多很实用的道具，比如大地图避战和跳跃提升，同时请完成主线后第一时间把公会等级提升至最高并把心次元的黑迷宫解锁，能够拿到迷宫内避战道具；
2、研发类成就可以往后拖，等到大多数成就做完的时候，你的材料也足够开发了；
3、宝藏猎人成就只需要将隐藏宝箱解锁而不需要获得，因此两个涅普探险迷宫可以不用通关，隐藏宝箱条件所提到的怪物都在第一层就可以见到；
4、二周目做复活结局时需要注意，公关等级6会有百万涅普节目，quiz king这个成就需要在一个档内把所有的百万涅普节目答对，因此最好看着答案打，不然还得再打一遍，心次元和零次元重新开放投资时已经接近游戏结尾了；
5、如果不是很享受游戏系统的话，我真的建议修改器该开就开，都玩pc了该享受的便利还是享受一下，别太折磨自己；
6、关于两个抽卡成就，我切成窗口化用按键精灵挂了一早上挂出来的，这个需要配合修改器的物品不减功能，我用的是按键精灵2014版本，代码如下：
[hr]
KeyPress "I",1
Delay 100
KeyPress "W",1
Delay 100
KeyPress "K",1
Delay 100
KeyPress "Shift",1
Delay 100
KeyPress "K",1
Delay 200
[/hr]
这需要使用默认键位，并先将光标放置在你需要开的道具上，这样挂着就可以轻松达成成就。

author: {'steamid': '76561198075089585', 'num_games_owned': 256, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 7858, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7858, 'last_played': 1613506050}
review:
Easily the best main Neptunia game, in literally every way possible.
The story is very enjoyable and the ending can hit hard if you let yourself in on it. It also is a good 35-40h long if you neither rush nor excessively grind.
Characters: This is what the entire franchise lives off, the blood that flows through the game code. Love them or hate them, by a major chance this will decide wether or not you enjoy neptunia in its entirety. I loved them, every single one, their quirks cause hilarious dialogue.
The visuals are solid, dungeon design can be a bit bland, some assets or layouts get re-used, graphically its good on the eyes though, nothing photorealistic here but that was never the goal with it being an anime game. On the other hand you got the Visual novel aspect and its done neatly, clean textures, fully lip synched, breathing animations, various expressions and poses, a nice presentation.
Sound design is pretty nice, menu sounds can get mildly lame but music is overall very good, i loved most of the soundtracks. The voices are brilliant, i personally prefer the japanese dub because almost every line is voiced in it, the english dub is rather incomplete but wherever present its very good. IMO the japanese dub in particular was so enjoyable, jokes were delivered so well, it had me audibly laughing a number of times.
Gameplay is probably the most encompassing neptunia has ever been. Weapons with combo slots, combos with special effects and chain effects, free range positioning in combat, investment system, travel and ambushes, multiple endings, a story sequence with 4 separated paths and more and more...

Verdict:
Objectively its an above average game with plentiful mechanics and lots to offer to keep the player busy for a significant amount of time, the story offers a very enjoyable time but you need to suspend a lot of doubt and disbelief and really let yourself in on it, if you find typical 'anime' things cringy you're gonna have a bad time.
The characters are the key aspect of this game, and the entire franchise really, wether or not you like them is subjective.

review:
Well I bought this because I wanted to finish every single Neptunia Game, it is pretty grindy if you don't buy any of the weapon/armor DLC's. Infact it makes it kind of hard during the whole game. 
Personally the story did not really interest me at all - dialogues were way too long. 
The "3 Chapters" though are a neat thing. 

For me it's an okay-ish game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198085930470', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 3427, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3427, 'last_played': 1535482148}
review:
Надо было писать этот отзыв еще давно, когда память была свежая. Тем не менее, вкратце:

Что понравилось:
- Отличный дизайн локаций, особенно понравились мрачные разрушенные уровни в начале игры (позже мы туда возвращаемся) 
- Появилась озвучка у монстров, добавляет атмосферы
- Хорошие новые персонажи
- Сюжет интереснее, чем в прошлых частях, оригинальный

Что не понравилось:
- Измененная боевка, какая-то странная. Можно взять меч покруче, но у него всего 2 удара. И удары только определенные. 
- В предыдущих частях был выбор локаций - просто список, выбираешь нужную и оказываешься там. Здесь персонаж прямо таки перемещается, бежит по карте. Бежать можно из одного конца в другой. Присутствуют случайные бои в таком режиме, не на самой локации, как это привычно для jrpg, а на... выборе локаций. Рандом зависит, похоже, от характеристик персонажей. Хорошо помню, что в моем случае в начале игры таких нежелательных боев было очень много, а ближе к концу - почти не было. Очень много лишнего времени на это тратится. Явно сделано, чтобы игрок больше времени тратил на прохождение. А ведь иногда можно нарваться на довольно сильных врагов. 
- Вместе с этим сделали усложнение - левел-ап не восстанавливает здоровье автоматически. Выход из локации тоже не восстанавливает здоровье, для этого надо идти до города. Вместе с предыдущим пунктом - можно оказаться в такой ситуации, что вы потратили время на подземелье, а потом умерли просто по пути в город. Хардкор? По мне так просто нас заставляют тратить больше времени на игру, чем следует. Вместо этого лучше бы сделали какие-нибудь сайд-квесты или что-нибудь другое.
- Опять фарм и повторяющиеся локации. Но это уже мелочь, в предыдущих частях это тоже было. 

В целом, любителям данной франшизы понравится. Любителям jrpg вообще - тоже.

review:
bought and finished this on the ps4 too,

probably the best neptunia game out right now, better than viir too even though viir is a remake or remaster of this game or whatever this game is still better, the story is good, you have literally 3 whole arcs that's like 3 whole games in one megadimension fits the name perfectly and you have nep nep and friends and so many playable characters in the game, and different endings too unlike viir which only has one ending this one actually has multiple plus the fights are rpg but you don't really have to grind either and the soundtrack is great i love sailing of a daydream

author: {'steamid': '76561198064329438', 'num_games_owned': 207, 'num_reviews': 111, 'playtime_forever': 4153, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4084, 'last_played': 1612237038}
review:
68小時全成就達成  算是勉強能玩的一作
首先steam版這裡只有英文語言 沒有中文或者日文語言  有點可惜
然後這一作比起重生1 2 3 新增了不少新的東西 作為重生1 2 3全成就大師的我 也需要慢慢適應  比起前幾作加了不少bgm 也算好聽

然後是主線方面 1周目難度比起前幾作稍微高一點 戰鬥完也只有前衛能獲得經驗 後衛沒有經驗（有兩個角色例外 或者把光碟裏面有黃色lv3競速裝備到角色才有經驗） 關卡也沒有什麼經驗多的怪物 所以只能強推主線（其實有玩過這個系列的人都知道1周目是直接推主線到結局的） 
到超次元篇 它有分4條路線 每條路線都有自己的主線劇情 而且資源幾乎獨立計算 所以也是在道具少的情況下強推主線 達成普通結局之前 將零次元或心次元的公關等級升到最高10級 獲得高價處理器 前者一個可以賣5000萬 後者一個賣250萬 然後達成普通結局 在2周目也有足夠的錢去達成真結局

說一下這個steam版本和其他版本的不同之處 首先最為影響遊戲體驗的傷害bug 技能傷害只有4位數的傷害 上限就大概角色99級的傷害 後面等級高了 普攻傷害正常 但技能傷害沒增加
其次是經驗加成比其他版本少10倍 這作可以透過連段來獲得加成 但是steam版加成被削弱 導致遊戲整體升級速度變慢 加上這作練級速度比起前幾作慢好多 升級需求比前幾作高了好幾個等級 150級也需要1千萬以上經驗才能升1級 要到999級 起碼要在黑迷宮殺6000隻1千萬經驗的怪 不如用修改算了 前作1千萬以上經驗升1級 沒記錯的話應該是950級之後了
最後steam版還少了兩個999級競技場 就算有了也玩不了 這作升級太慢 等級練不起來 

成就方面 這裡講的是達成全成就大師之前做的一個成就 重生1是刷1億錢（很快刷到）重生2是令人窒息的全迷宮稱霸成就 重生3是先刷百合 後刷1億錢 然後這一作V2的成就 居然是抽卡和探索所有隱藏寶箱成就 
隱藏寶箱看起來難做 實際不難做 把裏面條件達成就可以了 就需要一點時間 然後是需要驗證血統抽卡成就 這是最後一個做到的成就 做這個成就起碼用了我8小時去做完 SR卡片太難抽了 非洲人30連全部N卡

author: {'steamid': '76561198361008342', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 9160, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6550, 'last_played': 1687189480}
review:
A bit different from the Re;birth trilogy, but maintains the core element of the aforementioned installment.

The difference in this installment and the trilogy is mostly the stuff that made me prefer this over the other. Of course, there are also some stuff minor stuff that kinda made me have a mixed feeling about this game.

Since the pros are a lot more than the cons, so  I just gotta bring up the cons, or my personal gripe with the game;
You travel from one place to another in the world map instead of instances like in the trilogy,
Characters can ONLY level up if they participate in a battle (or have the skill "EXP share"). This one is the most glaring for me considering that there are a LOT of characters and I would feel cheap if I focus only a couple of them. Again, this is far different from the trilogy in which every character in the party (including reserve party members) gain EXP.
And lastly, for a game that can reach up to level 999, there isn't a lot of method to speed up the process, not even paid DLC. This brings the second issue back to light.

These are the only issues I have with the game.

Other than that, it's a fun adventure with the gang. With lots of stuff to look forward to, especially if you play the other installment before Megadimension.

author: {'steamid': '76561198010541939', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 777, 'playtime_forever': 1830, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1830, 'last_played': 1608760192}
review:
И почему эта игра не считается визуальной новеллой? Здесь от визуальной новеллы больше чем от РПГ.
DLC советую вообще не покупать, т.к. от них больше вреда чем пользы. Разве что за исключением Ultimate Weapon Pack, что бы гриндить не приходилось. Остальной шмот мало того что только занимает место в инвентаре (его нельзя продать и приходится листать в поисках нужного), так его ещё приходится каждый раз выбирать заново как только персонаж выйдет из пати и зайдёт обратно - а это в этой игре происходит очень часто. Персонажи из DLC не нужны и просто висят мёртвым грузом по сравнению с основными персонажами, ведь персонажам из DLC ультимативное оружие не завезли.
А в остальном Пертупил, как Пертупил, местами мило, местами забавно, в этот раз сюжет эпичный.

author: {'steamid': '76561198031225726', 'num_games_owned': 341, 'num_reviews': 131, 'playtime_forever': 3531, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3351, 'last_played': 1623532676}
review:
Please grab some pudding, as reading may take a while.
The review contains no spoilers, generally.

[i]MDN V2[/i] is a role-playing game, a subcategory from [i]turn-based strategy games[/i][spoiler](this term is less irritating to me at least)[/spoiler] (with elements of a business simulation game, in late game). 

The atmosphere of the game - no matter how you look - fits well with the player during the current Pandemic (2020-2021). 
Overall, I am very pleased that the game has touched my emotions (including: confusion, joy, sadness, anger, euphoria, empathy). There is no despair, fortunately. 

[i]MegaDimension Neptunia VII[/i] belongs to the [i]Hyperdimension Neptunia[/i]-series  of role-playing games. 
 Not knowing the plot of older games does not ruin the fun, because the most important basics will appear. (It may even motivate you to play them.) 

Issues:
* At the begin it is easy: finish a dungeon- unlock the next. In next chapter, you should check (at least) the guild ; 
* I hope for you to be lucky like me and not lose during a Boss-fight-”marathon”  (no saves in between, no item-shop as well. Worst case: any kind of real life interruption) ;
* Unbalanced weight about plot-battles: some 'middle'-plot-fights were much, much more surprising than the finals ;
* Not recommended for achievement-hunters, unless you have a lot time and using guides.

From a technical point of view, I have nothing to complain about.
It's a pity that the dialogues are not having a preview/thumbnail in the playlist .
The girls have great talents ( [i]If you know what I mean[/i]) – waifu material and such.
Last but not at least: The soundtracks -  Fantastic+. Can listen 10h versions of some.

Would I recommend the game ? [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KevvoZY_y0U][b]Absolute[/b][/url]


Credits: 
*[i]Vallinek[/i] - for recommending me . 
*[i]Cbast[/i] - Gift - for my pictures that I drew for him for years and the (2) games I bought.

review:
This game is honestly fuckin great! The only Nep game I could 100% recommend somebody play. Wholeheartedly enjoyed it from start to finish. 
It's hard to play the previous titles after playing this one because it's such a step up in quality in every single aspect. It also brings forth a new best girl, Uzume. She's great, and if you say otherwise then fuck you.
It's a real shame there's been no main series games since, because they finally got their act together and made a good one!

author: {'steamid': '76561198104746247', 'num_games_owned': 527, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 4377, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4377, 'last_played': 1501101697}
review:
對一個SEGA老粉來說

這一代真的是一邊流淚一邊大笑的玩完

dreamcast年代的美好回憶加上Nep與她的快樂夥伴真的是完美組合

相較前幾代來說這代劇情真的是不同等級的感動

只要曾經喜歡dreamcast和sega帶來的美好時光

就算沒特別喜歡NepNep的玩家也可以考慮玩玩看

遊戲走私客有一集podcast在聊DC SS PS那個年代的主機大戰與這款遊戲

有興趣一起回憶可以來聽聽看!
https://apple.co/3hfJ9X6

也可以直接搜尋: 遊戲走私客 #14

review: 海王星的系统一代比一代好，这一部的手感已经比我能想到的大部分日式RPG都要强了。剧情除了真结局不太够味道外也是收放自如，非女神系角色融合得很不错。不过新加入的即死地牢以及强调刷的成就都是不好的尝试，后期的体验并不快乐。

review:
El mejor Neptunia en mi opinión.
Los gráficos están a otro nivel y la jugabilidad es más variada, ya que paras cambiando los ataques para conseguir un buen combo. La historia es muy entretenida y los nuevos personajes son de lo mejor de la saga (Neptune adulta y Uzume)

author: {'steamid': '76561198012911407', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 4199, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4199, 'last_played': 1600224811}
review: Having played the previous games in the series, I was pretty dismayed at the amount of recycled content in this one. If this had been the first and only game in the series, I might have enjoyed it a little more. Instead, I feel like this is the last game from their series that I'll be inclined to play.Don't get me wrong - I genuinely liked the previous titles, with the 3rd probably being my favorite in terms of gameplay (despite the signs of some recycling being already present). That said, I think the changes and additions in this game were in mostly the wrong places; it very much felt like a "quantity over quality" approach was taken to release this game. There are more glitches and nuisances than I recall previous games having, and eventually they just sap the fun out of the overall experience.I'd recommend skipping this one, especially if you've played the previous games in the series.

author: {'steamid': '76561198116678938', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 390, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 390, 'last_played': 1599375727}
review: I was attracted for all the reviews so I decided to give it a try. i am a kind of completionist, and I usually don't give up on games so easily. I try to enjoy them at its maximum. My conclusion is that the game is only suitable for the fans of the series. I did not see anything overly attracting for playing the game. Too many lengthy, silly, and irrelevant dialogues that make the game really slow. Battles were ok and I agree that it has an interesting battle dynamics. But yet again, the story pace was too slow which made me wonder, why should I invest my time playing this JRPG knowing that there are others much more better and worthy of my time?

author: {'steamid': '76561198075142895', 'num_games_owned': 248, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 8267, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8212, 'last_played': 1665199726}
review:
Neptunia VII (Or I called it Victory 2) shakes things up from the original game. It was supposed to be split up to 3 games from what I heard in earlier development of the game. But the IF/CH heads wanted to make it into one giant game. So it's kinda like Kirby Superstar Deluxe in a way. Anyways.....

The Good:

Battle System: The battle system goes back to the Rebirth 1/2 system with a bit of a twist here.

3 Games into 1: There are 3 "games" or in this case arcs that you need to deal with. Zero Dimension Arc, Hyper Dimension Arc & Heart Dimension Arc.

Cute Models/Designs: Honestly, I love the graphics on this game. Same goes to VIIR.

DLC Characters: DLC Characters can come really in handy in this game. I recommended getting Umio & Nepgya. They will join you right away at the beginning of the game and can still tag along in the 2nd arc. Which you and whomever you pick will be alone for the beginning for a bit, getting a possible game over if you are not careful. Other DLCs are Nitroplus & God Eater. There is one more BUT... (See the bad)

The Bad:

Neplunker: I HATE THIS FEATURE SO MUCH! I don't mind playing as X character running around. But I don't like lives.....In A JRPG game.....with poor judgement features. Basically if you fall over half of your character's height you lose a life. Which is bad if your favorite character is Blanc, Rom or Ram because jumping basically meaning jumping TO YOUR FRIGGING DEATH.

About That DLC Character....: The other DLC character is Million Arthur. which because Square Enix is a greedy SOB and dosen't want to bargin a deal with IF/CH. The DLC Character is dead. If you are lucky enough to get her when is a avaiable good on you. But if not the only way you can get her is if you can go to another storefront to get her or find somebody who hasn't activived her. If you are lucky enough. (and yes. She not in the NA Switch version either.)

Bad Ending is worthless and a waste of time: Basically what it is.

author: {'steamid': '76561198032045258', 'num_games_owned': 534, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 1447, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1447, 'last_played': 1581513475}
review:
Another entry into the "HyperRecycled Assets" franchise.
You've played this game three times already.
Every dungeon. Every sprite. Every animation. Every joke. Every dungeon, again.

author: {'steamid': '76561198979556009', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1248, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1229, 'last_played': 1627190142}
review: Love pretty much everything about this game besides a few things. First off the controls on pc are complete garbage. Second the combat can get very repetative and traversing the map is quite annoying because weak enemies constantly ambush you or the opposite happens, where enemies stronger than you kill you instantly if you are low on health and you couldn't escape or heal. Going off that, I love when bosses provide interesting and powerful attacks and I don't mind 1 hit attacks or time based party knock out attacks, however, is this game bosses get to use those completely randomly making some fights either, too easy, perfect, a heal fest or impossible. Besides that I love the story and the character and while I don't hate the ideas of the combat system, I just dislike how they where implemented

author: {'steamid': '76561198116072691', 'num_games_owned': 482, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 6124, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2806, 'last_played': 1649200357}
review:
Points Positifs :
-Scénario super sympa avec de bons rebondissements
-Next Form vraiment stylées
-Les Musiques !!! OMG les musiques !!!
-Aventure longue
-Enormement de choses a faire en Post Game
-Systeme d'investissement pour chaque nation 
-3 Dimensions !!

Points Négatifs :
-LES RENCONTRES ALEATOIRES SUR LA PREMIERE RUN!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
-Donjons parfois répétitifs
-Difficulté vraiment trop mal gérée vers la fin ( Un combat facile, juste après tu passe 5h a farm pour passer le suivant)

Ma note : 
16/20
-1 point pour les rencontres aléatoires + les donjons parfois répétitifs
-3 points pour cette pu*** de difficulté insensée par moment malgrès du farming ! Obligé d'utilisé le DLC Ultimate Weapon pour passer un seul combat.......

author: {'steamid': '76561198110707101', 'num_games_owned': 48, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 4914, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4396, 'last_played': 1610051337}

author: {'steamid': '76561198153310025', 'num_games_owned': 320, 'num_reviews': 117, 'playtime_forever': 1794, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1787, 'last_played': 1598623726}
review:
刚打完一周目普通结局，来说说感想。
首先新角色涡芽人设很好，很有反差萌，很让人喜欢。
游戏性上略有创新，但也不能说是颠覆性的。
剧情在海王星历代作品中都算比较出色的。
超次元篇分四条线叙述很不错，既增加了游戏篇幅，又给了每个人表现的舞台。
音乐方面本作有一首十分动人的心次元op，配合画面简直满分。
画面经过改进已与前几个世代大不相同了。
总的来说买就是了。

author: {'steamid': '76561198077688587', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 100, 'playtime_forever': 46, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 46, 'last_played': 1597797157}
review:
Tengo que decir un par de cosas sobre este juego:

En primer lugar es de ataques por turnos y este detalle no viene reflejado en la tienda de steam. Es un genero muy especifico que no gusta a todo el mundo, ya que el ritmo es lento.

Y en segundo lugar es rol japones. Eso significa infinidad de cajas de texto con frases tontas e insustanciales. Que por supuesto solo estan traducidas al ingles y japones. Los nipones son muy tacaños en este sentido y solo les interesan los mercados de miles de millones de posibles compradores. Para ellos España, Francia o Alemania son minucias.

Si a esto añadimos que la interfaz del juego tapa la mitad de la pantalla y los tipicos fogonazos luminicos (esos tan famosos que producen epilepsia y que le encantan a bart simpson) hacen del producto final algo no muy recomendable.

Como resulta que no soy fan del anime, no me siento hipnotizado por las muñequitas siliconadas y sus tetas saltarinas. Que tampoco se trata de un juego porno, solo goza de cierto erotismo.

En resumen el juego me parece ñoño, lento y aburrido.

Tambien senti curiosidad por otro de la saga que es de cortar y tajar, pero los enemigos eran tan ridiculos y pateticos (huevos saltarines tipo angry birds, pero todavia mas simples, bolas con ojos) que rapidamente me desanime y perdi el interes.

Asi pues las calificaciones de juego fantastico, maravilloso, vienen de parte de los fanaticos del anime. Tendencia que es perfectamente respetable. Yo solo pretendo dar una opinion mas neutral.

author: {'steamid': '76561198262452338', 'num_games_owned': 1861, 'num_reviews': 210, 'playtime_forever': 2413, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 986, 'last_played': 1598699485}
review:
I've never played a Neptunia game before but since the franchise is so popular and I love JRPG's I figured I'd give it a try. Neptunia VII (pronounced "vee-two", not "seven"!) seemed like the most polished and popular one out of the bunch so that's what I went with.

I've gotta say I was pleasantly surprised. The writing is really funny and despite the over-the-top moe aesthetic it still doesn't come off as cringe. It can be a bit meta at times and does break the 4th wall occasionally but it's all in good fun. It genuinely made me laugh out loud many times. And the English dub is so good I never even bothered switching to Japanese audio (which is still an option).

Anyhow, Neptunia VII follows your average JRPG formula, it's a turn-based JRPG with numerous story scenes presented in the visual novel format. The game features a large cast of female characters with the main heroines being loosely based on various video game consoles with the protagonist Neptune being a reference to the unreleased Sega Neptune console. The girls can transform into "goddesses" a la Sailor Moon, Power Rangers etc, and this gimmick is important both story and gameplay wise. They all live in the world called Gamindustri and as you can expect the whole thing is chock full of video game references and meta jokes. VII is technically the 4th mainline game in the series (taking place after the Re;Birth trilogy) but the stories are only loosely connected and you can play the games in any order. The game is played in two modes, dungeon crawling and story scenes. The visual novel segments are quite lengthy and feature fully animated HD sprites with full lip sync and even breathing etc animations. But sadly only the main story scenes are fully voiced.

You'd think, so is this just a visual novel with low effort JRPG parts bolted on? Actually, no. The combat has surprising depth. The game has positioning, there are not only different party formations but you can also move freely (within a radius, no action points) during each individual character's turn. There's a quite intricate combo chaining system, as well as your usual skills (epic anime attacks that cost SP) plus buffs/heals and the above mentioned super hero transformations. I have to say, the difficulty is quite high so you really need to learn the system well. Or just [spoiler]buy the OP DLC gear[/spoiler]. It's not uncommon to get 3 shot by random mobs or inflicted with a status you didn't think to buy a cure for. Overall, while it's not Disgaea it's still quite a bit more sophisticated than your usual JRPG.

The only real blemish is the lackluster dungeon design. The level assets range from very poor to decent looking which is a bit jarring. The character models are gorgeous though. Their victory poses are adorable!

[h1]Tech Notes:[/h1]
The game is locked at 1080p no matter the actual resolution, use [url=https://github.com/AterialDawn/MegaresolutionNeptunia]this mod[/url] to either decrease or increase the game's internal resolution. Even if you're playing at 1080p you can set the mod to 4K which will reduce the aliasing and make the game look sharper. I also recommend turning off Depth of Field as all it does is make the game blurry. Installing the game to an SSD will also help to minimize loading times and stutter.

author: {'steamid': '76561198095082555', 'num_games_owned': 543, 'num_reviews': 363, 'playtime_forever': 2889, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2871, 'last_played': 1598053566}
review:
The game isn't perfect, but I still love it. Also, this version is much better than the remaster (VIIR). 

[h1]THE GOOD[/h1]
It has some of the best writing of the entire series, imo. The finale is one of the best in any game in the series, it made me very emotional several times.

Uzume and Umio are great new characters, and the Zero Dimmension is my favorite of the universes in the series.

Great new songs.

Very good combat system. Getting rid of the guard system is a great move, enemy guard was always just sort of annoying in the past and the new system of only having a health bar is much more fun.

Special attack animations are fantastic.

Good endgame activities.

Overall the game makes great strides towards feeling more modern when compared to the previous titles.

[h1]THE BAD[/h1]
The game feels lazy at times, with reused dungeons and animations from the first game STILL making an appearance in this one.

One big example of pointless lazy filler is at the start of the 3rd act when the game makes you redo all of the Gold Third fights for absolutely no reason.

The new random encounters on the world map are horrible and all these fights do is make it unnecessarily difficult to get from dungeon to dungeon. I really miss the old overworld map with the characters that you could talk to.

My least favorite part of the game is how frequently your characters are taken away from you. Your party members are constantly being added and removed, it makes it feel like you never make any progress because all the work you put into a party member is probably just going to be thrown in the trash. You have all 4 CPUs in your party at the same time for like 5 hours maximum throughout the entire 45+ hour campaign.

[h1]TL;DR[/h1]
Very good, but hard to recommend to the average person, as is the case with most Nep games. Only recommended for hardcore Nep fans.

author: {'steamid': '76561198203270953', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 4757, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4757, 'last_played': 1595774159}
review:
_____ Avantages
Le jeu possède une très bonne histoire, découper un trois act pour les trois dimensions(ZeroDimension, Hyperdimension, HeartDimension).
De nouvelle mécanique s'ajoute chapitre au cours de l'histoire.
Le système de combat et presque similaire à "Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth3 V Generation".

_____ Inconvénients
Le jeu est beaucoup plus dur que les précédents jeux.
Le jeu ne propose pas de version Française.

_____ Autre
Faut-il joue au premier, deuxième et troisième jeu pour joue au quatrième?
je recommande d'avoir joué au deuxième et troisième pour joue au quatrième, le premier ne pas obligatoire.

_____ Conclusion
Je recommande le jeu, pour son histoire, car elle mais fin a l'histoire de l'Hyperdimension.

author: {'steamid': '76561198157096496', 'num_games_owned': 554, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 2833, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2833, 'last_played': 1596893650}
review:
[h1]Hyperdimension Neptunia Victory II[/h1]
Писать обзор на [spoiler]аниме кал[/spoiler] это произведение искусства меня надоумила моя четвёртая личность и ещё тот факт что это [spoiler]я надеюсь[/spoiler] последняя номерная часть нептунии, и на моё удивления, она самая крутая и приятная в плане прохождения. Я прошёл всю re:birth серию, и у меня есть что сказать про эти игры. Все они по своему плохие, какая-то хуже, какая-то лучше, но всю серию объединяет то, что в каждой из частей вы потратите примерно процентов 40-50 времени на скучный и быстро приедающийся гринд. И если же вы хотите сломать систему и пробежать игру, то она втопчет вас в грязь и насильно заставит потратить часть вашей жизни на унылый фарм мобов, и вы никуда от этого не убежите. Я как наивный дурачёк сел проходить первую нептунию, в целях вкусить ещё более анимешную Final Fantasy, но сам того не ожидая создал себе один из самых невероятных челленджей в своей жизни. И с перерывом в пол года\год, я начал проходить нептунии. И вот мой челлендж дошёл до четвёртой части игры...
[i]ГРАФИКА[/i]
Графика по сравнению с прошлыми частями не особо поменялась, но благодаря блюру и улучшенному освещению, игра кажется в разы красивее, но это лишь иллюзия. Текстуры такие же убогие, и всё так же бросается в глаза угловатость персонажей и мобов, хотя и самых колоритных мобов всё-таки перерисовали. Игра у меня идёт в 99999999 фпс, но всё ровно при начале битвы у меня проходит пролаг, и через 2-3 секунды начинается бой. На игру это особо не влияет, но в глаза бросается. Вылеты случались только при сохранении в начале эпизодов, по самой игре всё хорошо. 
[i]ГЕЙМПЛЕЙ[/i]
Самым главным изменением в этой части стали бои. Не могу сказать что они прям очень интересные и захватывающие, в большинстве своём это просто прожимание кнопок в определённом порядке, но тут стоит отметить то, что разработчики решили полностью перелопатить комбо удары персонажам. Теперь нет ни пробивающих, не сильных, ни быстрых ударов. Номинально они конечно присутствуют, но это не имеет никакого смысла. Самое главное, что нужно знать, это то, в какой правильной комбинации вы нанесёте больше урона критом. На самом деле это хорошее обновление, теперь вместо избегания нежелательных сражений, вы вступаете в бой и одним спелом убиваете всех врагов. И особенно сильно это облегчает бои с боссами. Теперь им не нужно пробивать броню и продумывать тактику боя с ним. В этом плане игра конечно деградировала, но сильно не обольщайтесь, гриндить меньше не прийдётся. Я не раз утыкался в тупики, и приходилось фармить, и я потратил на это примерно 20 часов, что как по мне непростительно много. Ещё из приятных нововведений я хочу отметить замену "Stella's Dungeon" на простенькую систему скаутов, которые значительно вам упростят гринд мобов, т.к дают солидные бонусы к опыту или кредитам. Данжи стали длиннее, и точка сейва теперь только одна, и по моему мнению это хорошее решение. Не к чему ставить повсюду точки сейвов если ты всегда можешь выйти на карту и засейвится, разработчики решили приучить игроков абузить эту фичу. Ещё мне понравилось то, что при новом уровне персонажа, ваш запал ХП и МАНЫ не восстанавливается, и это тоже вносит свою лепту в хардкорность. И ещё это значит то, что запасы зелий будут регулярно тратится коих теперь ограниченное количество. Теперь карта приключений представляет собой сеть дорог по которым ваше пати будет частенько перемещаться. И скажу честно, это наитупейшая механика в этой игре, невероятно бесящая штука. Даже в конце игры, вас будут донимать регулярными сражениями со случайными врагами, и самым правильным решением будет "сбежать с поля боя", ни опыта ни денег с этих боёв вы не получите. 
[i]СЮЖЕТ[/i]
Ну и мы подошли к самой главной части... Вкратце, в этой игре происходит полный пиздец, и я не хочу вообще ничего говорить о сюжете. Половина персонажей тупые как пробки, другая половина клишированы, я могу для себя выделить одного, ну максимум двух персонажей которые мне понравились [spoiler]ПУРУРУТ и НЕПТУН[/spoiler], все остальные - это просто позор. Такого заряда кринжа я давно не получал. Лично для меня эти бесконечные диалоги или эвенты, были ценны только из-за огромного количества пасхалок и иногда годных шуток [spoiler]шуток, которые не затрагивают размер груди, члена и т.п[/spoiler], во всём остальном это бред а не сюжет. Понравиться он я думаю истинным ценителям подобного жанра. И ещё он затянут, но в этой части такого ощущения я почему-то не испытал, но вот прошлые части я запомню надолго, особенно запомню чувство, когда наконец прошёл этот понос и больше никогда в него не вернёшься.
[i]ИТОГ[/i]
Не нашёл куда можно впихнуть музыку этой игры, но музыка тут действительно неплохая и особо не надоедает. Единственное "НО", это то, что она не ИЗМЕНИЛАСЬ С ПРЕДЫДУЩИХ ЧАСТЕЙ!
[i]ГРАФИКА[/i] - [b]4 из 10[/b]; [i]ГЕЙМПЛЕЙ[/i] -[b] 4 из 10[/b]; [i]СЮЖЕТ[/i] -[b] 3 из 10[/b]; [i]МУЗЫКА[/i] - [b]8 из 10.[/b]
Итог 4 из 10

author: {'steamid': '76561198134300479', 'num_games_owned': 196, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 4498, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3014, 'last_played': 1611266607}
review:
Compared to the three Re;Birth games that chronologically come before Megadimension Neptunia VII, this game is definitely a step up. The story remains strong like in the previous games, but the game is less grindy, it doesn't recycle as many assets as the three aforementioned prequels and it contains slightly upgraded graphics and great new music. Even so, it seems to struggle with keeping a stable framerate at certain points. 

There's only one other complaint I have about this product, but it only really matters if you've played all the previous games like I have. To someone who's starting off with this game, this will be complete nitpicking and with good reason as it doesn't affect the game that much. Still, spoiler alert (for both this game and previous ones):
[spoiler] I already made it clear how this game is a sequel and this is important because it frequently references past events. In Re;Birth 3 the game had first introduced interdimensional travel, from hyperdimension to ultradimension. Despite this, the writers seem to have silently removed this ultradimension from the frame. The only thing we have in this game from Re;Birth 3 is Croire, but everything else seems to be forgotten. This is quite a shame since at the end of Re;Birth 3 they literally established a permanent gateway between ultradimension and hyperdimension. There was potential to be had here with characters from ultradimension since this game (Megadimension VII) touches a lot on traveling between dimensions. [/spoiler]

author: {'steamid': '76561198013699762', 'num_games_owned': 605, 'num_reviews': 105, 'playtime_forever': 3589, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3482, 'last_played': 1594935283}
review:
despues de completarlo casi al 100% puedo decir que es lejos el mejor neptunia de la saga principal.
-cuidaron mejor la historia
-tiene un OST tremendo
-me reí mas de lo que me hizo reir el rebirth 3

lo que le vi de malo es que a diferencia de los anteriores este te limita bastante si quieres ver todo en el juego , basicamente que es complicado llegar al 100%.
Llegado un punto dije "no voy a estar dos horas relogeando para sacar las cartas estas"
Llegado un punto dije "vale la pena armarse estas armas si ya termine todo lo que habia para hacer en el juego?"

Digo que es recomendable terminar el juego en todas sus rutas + cualquier contenido con alguna mini historia para luego dejarlo , no intentes ir por el 100% por que es bastane tedioso , nada que ver con los anteriores que realmente te motivaba a completarlo.

review: 萌新这部入坑，一周目50+小时。没dlc总想着赶紧过主线。结果被各种锤，还不断尝试（还差一行血 我能过 嗯 翻车了）偶尔被小怪锤，被涅普探险坑（我手残）总算教会了我存档的重要性。第一周目升天结局，最后一章看了看攻略，刷了半天金币投资想着二周目直接真结局，最后把等级也，刷上去了 轻松锤过了最后一章。诶，慢慢肝吧。汉化的话第二个热评dalao留的我觉得很好用√

author: {'steamid': '76561198130497925', 'num_games_owned': 306, 'num_reviews': 59, 'playtime_forever': 7610, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7610, 'last_played': 1566501469}
review: A lot of people look at Neptunia and only see ''haha funny cute anime girl meme game'', but Megadimension Neptunia VII is much more than that, this game is unironically a masterpiece in my opinion, and its easily the best Neptunia game in the entire series. First of all, most people say that you should not play Neptunia for the gameplay, and that its only good for the characters and story, but while this game's gameplay is still far from perfect, its easily the most fun in the series. The story is also genuinely great, and the tone strikes a perfect balance between the silly, cute and comedic moments the series is known for, and more serious moments. The graphics are also much better than the earlier games, that is to be expected when jumping from the Playstation Vita to the Playstation 4, but still, the game looks great. The new characters are also really great, and the soundtrack is easily my favorite in the series. In my opinion, this game is by far the best game in the entire Neptunia series in practically every aspect.

author: {'steamid': '76561198304883040', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 3578, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3217, 'last_played': 1593450338}

This is be the best Neptunia game so far for me.

author: {'steamid': '76561198441526226', 'num_games_owned': 174, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 6290, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 560, 'last_played': 1599805533}
review: 信仰入正！本作画面质感提升明显，虽然仍有提升空间，剧情超长的同时还不失乐趣！不过想多周目肯定是有些长奥，合光碟集卡有一说一虽然过程有些腻味，但是！一切都是为了收集带来的成就感！虽然感觉就是在steam上应该不会有精力这么做了哈哈哈，有一说一这一作的剧情依然是有一种震撼却格格不入的感觉，可能这个系列始终就是这样吧？不过我认为本身就是一个讲述一行人的故事，没必要那么动人，但却仍能体现出他的精彩，这就是超次元海王星吧！能知道这样的游戏我感觉我是此生无憾了！！！ps：出招时手柄震动会添加无形打击感，好像只有本作有，居然莫名的会觉得有些爽！？最后祝大家游戏愉快！！！

author: {'steamid': '76561198060331915', 'num_games_owned': 297, 'num_reviews': 70, 'playtime_forever': 6493, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5973, 'last_played': 1710262692}
review:
Игра читается как Victory 2, но так же она является 7-мой основной игрой, если считать оригинальные игры и ремейки.
Из трилогии третья часть была отличной, но вот эта номерная часть для меня оказалась наилучшей. Это прямое продолжение предыдущей игры (Victory и его ремейка Re;Birth 3 V Generation). Здесь собрано лучшие элементы из всех частей, даже персонажей из первой неканонической игры вернули. Были перерисованы и добавлены новые спрайты поз персонажам и задних фонов в новельной части игры. Добавлены новые большие данжи, но старые так же есть, без них это уже не Нептуния. Враги, как в U unleashed получили озвучки и их забавно слушать. Я не понимаю тех нытиков, которые возмущаются в том что вернули EXE-шкалу и это делает игру легкой, но какая идет речь о балансе в одиночной РПГ игры, если можно просто прокачать персонажей до максимального уровня и потом быть врагов с одного удара. Вот например мне не хватало этой шкалы, потому что вместо нее требовалась мана, которая после выхода из данжа не восстанавливалась, и приходилось покупать ману в магазине и потом выходить на "пикник" чтобы ее восстановить + скилл восстановление маны от Ром. Ориентиры для выполнение заданий так же есть, но почему то только на убийства монстров, но не на поиск предметов, ладно не критично, можно посмотреть в ту же Непедию.  Музыка высший класс! Как в предыдущей игры, новую игру + можно начать когда захочешь, но если вы прошли игру на "обычную концовку" то вы этого сделать не сможете. Была переделана боевая система,  вы теперь можете разнообразить комбо а не использовать ту же несколько раз подряд. Их можно усилить от требований комбо удара, например "предыдущий удар должен быть быстрым, сильным или обычным". Сюжет, шутки и отсылки как в предыдущей игре отличные, злодеи и второстепенные персонажи были раскрыты. Я вижу много похожих моментов, которые были в аниме Digimon Adventure, для меня это вызывает ностальгию. Прокачивать героев можно только основную 4-ку, запасные и ожидающие персонажи опыт получать не будут, если у них не будет диска с чипом на обучение, или персонаж имеет возможность обучении по умолчанию. Но это сделано для того чтобы вы смогли сыграть за всех персонажей. Ах еще вот главное, игра поддерживает вибрацию геймпада, можно почувствовать как приземляются персонажи с большой высоты, исполнение ударов и способностей. Я так же нашел одну странность - настройки игры и сохранение игры имеют общий файл сохранение, так же игра может крашнутся так что сохраняйтесь как можно чаще.
Ах да, для получение истинной концовки нужно быть [b]ОЧЕНЬ[/b] внимательным и посмотреть все нужные ивенты, их легко пропустить, если вы пропустите хотя бы один, вы получите обычную концовку. Хотя все же лучше сначала получить ее, а потом истинную.
Игра мастхев для фанатов Нептунии!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jp1HmiGQOqI

review:
Vale, este juego me ha llevado más para completar el 100% de lo que esperaba.
Solo voy a decir que este es el mejor juego de neptunia (de la serie principal) que hay hasta ahora, increíble música, historia mejor balanceada, mejora en los gráficos, pocos modelos reutilizdas (de anteriores juegos)...
Lo único que me molestó es que normalmente tenga lag en los menus. Claramente este juego no esta hecho para tener a un "neplunker", fue desafiante, pero a la vez injusto, no es injusto porque sea difícil, sino porque no sabes porqué has muerto.

author: {'steamid': '76561198100928232', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 4231, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3031, 'last_played': 1688573301}
review:
Muhahaha! In diesem Spiel habe ich neben meiner Herzensdame meine zweite große Liebe gefunden, die (aufgrund ihrer Nichtexistenz) auch geduldet wird - Uzume! Uzume is love, Uzume is life! <3 Sie gehört mir, meins! :3

Aber um das Spiel an sich zu beschreiben:
🟢 Fantastische Story, man hat sich sehr viel Mühe gegeben

🟢 Sehr schöner Kampfstil. Bin ich ja schon von den vorherigen Spielen gewohnt. Rundenbasiert ist generell genau meins, damit bin ich schon bei Final Fantasy aufgewachsen.

🟢 OHNE DLCs ist das Spiel sogar tatsächlich sehr schwer. Ich empfehle euch, so wie ich das auch gemacht habe beim ersten Mal die DLCs weg zu lassen.

🟡 Vielfältige Charakter-Gestaltungsmöglichkeiten in Sachen Outfits und Accessoires. Manches ist davon zugegeben mehr unnötig, als das es einen Nutzen hat, aber das ist ein verzeihbarer Fehler.

🟢 Jede Aktion im Spiel wird irgendwo belohnt und einige Key Items sind einfach nur fantastisch wie der Jumping Star oder der Dash oder eben auch das Verzeihen des Versagens im Neplunker. Großartig.

🟢 Die Idee der Nextform hat allen Neptunia Fans die Krone aufgesetzt. Geil!

🟢 Die Sha Charaktere sind von der Konzeption her total gelungen. Ebenfalls geil!

❤️ Wie schon gesagt: Uzume is love, Uzume is life!

🟡 Den Zero Dimension Arc fand ich durchschnittlich bis gut. Die etwas dunkle Atmosphäre war gewöhnungsbedürftig, aber passend.

🟡 Der Neptunia G Arc war beim ersten Playthrough echt anstrengend. Vorallem, um die True End Requirements zu erfüllen. Auch haben mich die Kämpfe gegen S-Sha und C-Sha echt einiges an Nerven gekostet.

🟢 Der Heartdimension Arc war dann aber das Meisterwerk. Man erfährt erst gegen Schluss, wer der boshafte Mastermind hinter allem ist. Sehr geil. 

🟢 Das Kolosseum bietet tolle Herausforderungen für jene, denen der letzte Endboss zu schwach war.

🟢 Es wird ein [b]kostenloses[/b] DLC mitgeliefert, welches die maximale Levelbegrenzung von Level 99 aufhebt und auf 999 erhöht. Dazu viel Spaß im Senmuu-Labyrinth!

[b]Fazit[/b] 
Vollumfassend fantastisches Spiel und eine absolute Empfehlung wert!

review: From the small amount of this game that I played I can tell why the Neptunia franchise is popular. The writing was amusing and the parts of the story that are voice acted were well done. The combat system wasn't very fun however and the menus felt overly complex. So I would say if you are looking for an engaging gaming experience, this game isn't for you. If you are looking for a visual novel with game elements, then I would check this out.

review: Last main game in series... It was really good indeed! There is new graphics, some battle system and world map adjustments... but aside from that everything is the same as in the previous games. I enjoyed the story, characters and battle. I did not really like new "path" system where you build and travel on roads and you (yeah that sucks the most) encounter monsters on these roads... I mean it really gets annoying over time... It there were like events or items too... but just monsters... nah thanks! I got normal ending and I am not planning to play again since there was never a reason for me to do so in neptunia games... But still really good experience and another great nep nep game! 7,5/10

review: I'd recommend this game to anyone who likes strategy games and RPGs. The characters are charming and the story is quite good. Neptunia's combat system is essentially a grid based tactical RPG combined with a standard turn based one, each character having different attacks which have unique traits. Different equipment can alter stats and give unique combo trees.

author: {'steamid': '76561198931970079', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 4364, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1850, 'last_played': 1686950538}
review:
Час моего обзора... 
Итак, пройдя один длинный путь я вышел на концовку где [spoiler] Узуме умирает [/spoiler]. Прослезившись я глянул достижения и заметил ещё концовку, настоящую. Я прошёл всё заново, но уже сделал особые требования и снова прослезился увидев, что она воскресла... Привязанность за всю игру усиливается.

Геймплей такой же, пару кнопок поменяли, игру сделали на том же движке, подтянули для мощных компов, что не может не радовать(ибо я имею средний пк). Новые фразы и новые приключения нашей Непы это всё, что нужно для щастья. Характеры те же, приятно и интересно было смотреть как развивается сюжет, добавили новые механики, всё приятно порадовало, в некоторых моментах придется немного пофармить, но по крайней мере немного.


Цена нормальная, новелла с элементами JRPG, игра примерно на 50 часов, цены на длс нормальние и сами длс позволяют не фармить, вас ждут новые приключения и море НЕПЫ))00))

Как говорится, к покупке рекомендую, Нептун одобряет

review: 萌新这部入坑，一周目50+小时。没dlc总想着赶紧过主线。结果被各种锤，还不断尝试（还差一行血 我能过 嗯 翻车了）偶尔被小怪锤，被涅普探险坑（我手残）总算教会了我存档的重要性。第一周目升天结局，最后一章看了看攻略，刷了半天金币投资想着二周目直接真结局，最后把等级也，刷上去了 轻松锤过了最后一章。诶，慢慢肝吧。汉化的话第二个热评dalao留的我觉得很好用√

review: The last main series game for now. The story for this game is massive and ambitious. Each Goddess has the chance to take centre stage and we are introduced to the fabulous Uzume. The Gold Third characters are all really good and as always there is plenty of humour here and I really hope that they soon make a brand new main series game very soon because this series is the best one I have played in a long time

author: {'steamid': '76561198154623865', 'num_games_owned': 372, 'num_reviews': 54, 'playtime_forever': 23020, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 22611, 'last_played': 1661684654}
review:
先总结下综合评价，这部作品确实和前作有很大的进步，主要是剧情，其次是建模质量和滤镜

再说说游戏体验，在前期，任务流程让我伤脑筋的就是输出BUG，再打病娇少女凯瑟那段，我是买了海男和Nitroplus的DLC过去的，毕竟这BUG技能伤害比普攻伤害低，这个是修复不了的，别指望了。

再说说后期，RE结局后我肝奖杯那段时间，再研发道具途中去了妮普探险零（不是妮普探险，是妮普探险零），我进图后就看见前方有一条生命捡，我刚一捡跳下台阶就当场去势了，我以为是碰到蝙蝠的毒液才死的，后来我才发现，我更本没碰到毒液，我死掉的原因是判定问题，这图的判定问题我真一肚子火，肺都要气炸，( ˘•ω•˘ )最后尝试了一个夜间的时间才慢慢习惯那S.H.I.T一样的判定！

最后我再建议大家买原声DLC，网易的原声音乐评论区已经被碧蓝航线的ZZ用来写攻略了，最骚的是点赞还很多

[spoiler] 我永远喜欢帅气的涡芽[/spoiler]

review: The absolute best main Nep game by a country mile, does a lot to switch up the mechanics of the Rebirth games and the combat asks a lot more out of your combo making and character building than prior games. Story's great, every character gets a chance to shine and Uzume's a cutie. Only real problems are the utter lack of Plutia + Peashy, some annoying switching around of equipment when characters rejoin the party and not having any good ways to gain EXP for super high level DLC colosseum fights.

author: {'steamid': '76561197993847742', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 2302, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2302, 'last_played': 1513206392}
review:
I find this preferable over VII-R mainly due to the character DLC as well as the small things like the monster encyclopedia showing the numerical values of health as opposed to letter rank and it's easier to configure. It's been a while since I last played, but VII-R lacks 2k resolution support, instead going from 1080p right to 4k. Maybe VII has this, maybe not, but that's a gripe I have with VII-R, if not both.

However, VII-R does have some additions like the VR player room, caterpillar system, redesigned battle system in the area of combos mainly, as well as 64-bit and 4k support. I can't say I'd recommend one over the other unless you're a VR geek, or if you, like me, are willing to do without the additions in favor of the extra character DLC and such.

review:
P.s.: Если коротко, то эта игра - старая добрая Нептуния, только с КУЧЕЙ АПГРЕЙТОВ.
Awwww!!!!
Я влюбился в эту игру сразу же, как появился на первой локации!
Куча новых ШИКАРНЫХ саундтреков!
Куча новых персонажей, которые отлично прописаны!
Отличная графика!
Хорошая система боёвки!
Сложность игры на уровне, сложнее чем в Re;birth-ах!
Новые механики боёвки!
ШИКАРНЫЙ СЮЖЕТ!
Хорошие анимации!
ЭПИЧНЫЕ БИТВЫ С БОССАМИ!
Этот список можно перечислять бесконечно.

Единственный минус для некоторых - Игра требовательная. Поэтому с плохим пк не советую играть.

author: {'steamid': '76561198153335265', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 2946, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2382, 'last_played': 1583166023}
review:
Если вы закончили Hyperdimension и думаете, стоит ли идти дальше, то однозначно советую притронуться к этой части. Сюжет продолжает набирать обороты и даже не думает останавливаться: другие измерения, альтернативные версии из разных миров, ПЕРСОНАЖ МУЖСКОГО ПОЛА, эффект бабочки, интриги, преследования, всё как мы любим. Вместе с похорошевшей графикой и озвучкой каждого моба. Но, увы, с геймплейной точки зрения данная часть сильно деградировала и было принято много спорных решений. Полоску брони убрали, поэтому обычно боссы закидываются спецатаками без каких-либо раздумий [spoiler] думать над происходящим приходилось раза три за всю игру [/spoiler] . Уровень повышается только у тех, кто в команде, а не у всех, причем по сюжету всё время кого-то забирают. Сложных моментов, когда нужно идти гриндить ради победы над боссом, не встречается до последней части игры, но потом на расслабившегося игрока вываливают три боссфайта подряд без сохранения, для победы над которыми нужно внезапно поднять уровней 10 [spoiler] Огненный феникс из первой части передает привет [/spoiler]. 
Но это всё мелочи, на которые можно (хотя сложно) не обращать внимание, основная формула осталась без изменений. Посмотрите своими глазами, особо никого не слушайте. Осторожно перезаписывайте ячейки, тут три эндинга. И, самое главное: LT чтобы пропустить анимацию атаки!

author: {'steamid': '76561198359878141', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 6249, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6109, 'last_played': 1694219958}
review:
我永远热爱海王星~

pc版bug略多：
1. 二周目继承人物的话，则后期EX字样不会消失，无法触发DLC人物剧情
2. 等级升到100级后，技能伤害低
3. 就我而言，使用K-SHA的攻击combo：precision snipe，则会导致游戏崩溃，这使我消沉了好久。

还有些比较麻烦的地方就是：每次因剧情变化导致的人物加入和退出，都会使其设置最优装备，本不打算破坏游戏体验进行一周目，但每次都要重新设置就很麻烦。。
总体来讲是个好游戏，但希望能做的更好。。

author: {'steamid': '76561198059548754', 'num_games_owned': 244, 'num_reviews': 99, 'playtime_forever': 6347, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6347, 'last_played': 1580860940}
review:
So yeah i think this game is not one of those deep story written RPGs, but is it a good game? id say yes. Megadimension Neptunia story is kinda light but it's enjoyable nonetheless. If you've played previous entries you know you'll see more of NepNep shenanigans, and them 4th wall breaking actions. so heres the breakdown:

Them pros that i felt from my playthroughs:
(+) Fresh new story unlike the usual neptunia troupe (not hating it tho).
(+) They add the scouting system from fairy fencer F, which makes grinding a whole lot easier compared to previous entries.
(+) A simple city management feature.
(+) Improved character models compared to previous entry.

Them few cons that i felt from playing this game:
(-) Damage can be quite unbalance early game.
(-) Most mobs model are just recolor, although there are some new ones ofcourse, but not enough.

on a side note. who thought that adding a platformer in this game was a great idea anyway! sure it's a fresh feature in the neptunia series, but damn....the surface area where you can actually land its tiny AF. Do your self a favor and do the platformer dungeon on the 2nd playthrough, it'll be a whole lot easier. DONT DO IT ON YOUR FIRST RUN!.

...what's that smell? The sweet gacha. oh. it sings to me. THEY ADD GACHA IN THIS GAME!!! its not mandatory for the story or gameplay however IT IS necessary if you're going for 100%. So best of luck! 

All in all Megadimension Neptunia VII is the best series on the entry so far.

review:
Do you want to buy the game?
-> Yes
     No

Nothing much to say, I played re;birth 1,2,3 and this one and I had fun with all of them.
The story was good, characters can be serious or funny tho you'll assist some serious cutscene turning into a comedy thanks to some silly entrance of Neptune and friends. Gameplay is ok but I wished if they would have changed characters skills. Is since re;birth 1 that I always see same characters skill/special or HDD moves! Same with dungeons. I also was expecting to have certain characters back in this game, like Puchiko (Broccoli). For me a Neptunia game without Puchiko is sad! Just beware if you plan to buy it! I think this one contain more ecchi images than other re;birth serie!

review: Well, found out that this isn't my kind of game.  All you do is stand around with cardboard cut-out characters and scenes? author: {'steamid': '76561198065018206', 'num_games_owned': 381, 'num_reviews': 134, 'playtime_forever': 2306, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2172, 'last_played': 1575814146}
review:
a game made with a soul but without good execution, too much grind for no reason that can be skipped by purchasing overpowered DLCs, Spelunker dungeon is a complete BS due to bad controls, when you unlock new skills previous ones become completely irrelevant, some animations are extremely slow and clunky, overall combat system is pretty shallow too, few good music composition, level design is pretty mediocre at best, overall lack of content, 80% of the game are dialogs, also no postgame content at all

YET i enjoyed it because there are not much this kind of games on the market (radial movement and targeting)

also reading other reviews it looks like all this game's comunity care about is "(any character) hAs A nicE BuTt" "SeEiNg tHeM in BaTh ToWeLS WaS woRTH iT" and half of them didn't even played the game for more then 2 hours, according to steam achivements only 18% of all players actually bothered to finish the game at least for the normal ending and only 27% got to the half of the game

If you want a good turn based JRPG with radial skill targeting and movement go play Makai Kingdom(2005) it has much better level and music design, loads of unique characters to play, loads of weapons and epic skills, interesting characters and tons of other interesting in-game mechanics, also there is tons post game content and etc

author: {'steamid': '76561198077724160', 'num_games_owned': 212, 'num_reviews': 281, 'playtime_forever': 3713, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3027, 'last_played': 1631150525}
review:
If you want another tale from the Neptunia series, then this game is for you. HOWEVER, if you are looking for a game that doesn't require a super computer to run, has reasonable hit boxes, doesn't have the most infuriating level design ever, and has logical menu systems, look elsewhere.
Story: 9/10
Battle Mechanics: 7/10
Other Mechanics: 6/10
Optimization: 4/10
Level Design: 2/10
I'm a huge fan of everything Neptunia, and this game fits in perfectly considering the story, characters, and all the common themes of the series.
My BIGGEST complaint is the level design. The outdoor levels seemed fine, but the indoor levels were ridiculous. The amount of copy/paste was annoying. I spent 20 minutes lost in one of the old subway stations. I had to screenshot the map of the battleship and mark the doorways blocked with boxes before I realized that I needed a item to break them. Finally, the game became an absolute chore at the end with the blue mazes. Why were those even considered? At least the gold summits had a bit of depth and decoration compared to the mazes.
I'm not sure what engine this game uses, but this game runs worse than every other game in the series. My Core i7 GTX1050 computer struggles to keep [strike]40[/strike] 60 FPS and absolutely tanked if there is any amount of blur. As comparison, I can run Overwatch on high/ultra settings while maintaining 60 FPS even in intense fire fights.

Edit: I figured out my FPS problem. It still struggles, but I can keep around 60 which is my screen's refresh rate anyway.
